title: Comic Sans is dead and a vist to San Serriffe
content:
Just a little April 1st fun...

At approximately 08.30 this morning the lovable rebel of the design world passed away. Mr Sans, a well known graphic comedian has been in poor health in recent years, media exclusive and a mass designer repulsion had seen his worldwide popularity dwindle...

[Read more: Comic Sans Is Dead](http://web.archive.org/web/20131109011626/http:/www.betleywhitehorne.com/bwlog/2008/04/comic-sans-is-dead/)

Typoholiday resort...  
 [San Serriffe](http://web.archive.org/web/20131109011626/http:/www.betleywhitehorne.com/bwlog/2008/04/back-from-holiday-in-san-serriffe/)
author: SirriC
